item.description:
What better way to celebrate the end of the dog days of summer than by having a beer out on the patio... with a dog? Join the Craft Beer Crew at the Cambridge Brewing Company in Kendall Square for a few pints with a few pups.

We will have secluded patio space reserved for the group. The Cambridge Brewing Company was very generous in allowing us to invite a few of our canine friends, and we hope to have another Pups and Pints event in the future. We trust that you will only bring your pup if he or she is well behaved and plays well with others.

Humans without dogs are welcome, too!

**If you're bringing a dog, please let us know when you RSVP. Thanks!**
item.name: Pups & Pints!
